attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Keep GMT all year round. Stop changing the clocks, there is no need for it.
We live on the Greenwich mean line, where time zones start from . Let's keep GMT. The excuse that we need to be able to do business with Europe is not good enough, a lot of companies do business with India, are we going to change to their time zone ? I think not.
